description: Returns information on a specific signing platform.

parameters.name: platformId
parameters.description: The ID of the target signing platform.

nested_items.name: platformId
nested_items.description: The ID of the target signing platform.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the target signing platform.

nested_items.name: partner
nested_items.description: A list of partner entities that use the target signing platform.

nested_items.name: target
nested_items.description: The validation template that is used by the target signing platform.

nested_items.name: category
nested_items.description: The category type of the target signing platform.

nested_items.name: signingConfiguration
nested_items.description: A list of configurations applied to the target platform at signing.

nested_items.name: encryptionAlgorithmOptions
nested_items.description: The encryption algorithm options that are available for a code-signing job.

nested_items.name: allowedValues
nested_items.description: The set of accepted encryption algorithms that are allowed in a code-signing job.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: defaultValue
nested_items.description: The default encryption algorithm that is used by a code-signing job.

nested_items.name: hashAlgorithmOptions
nested_items.description: The hash algorithm options that are available for a code-signing job.

nested_items.name: allowedValues
nested_items.description: The set of accepted hash algorithms allowed in a code-signing job.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: defaultValue
nested_items.description: The default hash algorithm that is used in a code-signing job.

nested_items.name: signingImageFormat
nested_items.description: The format of the target platform's signing image.

nested_items.name: supportedFormats
nested_items.description: The supported formats of a signing image.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: defaultFormat
nested_items.description: The default format of a signing image.

nested_items.name: maxSizeInMB
nested_items.description: The maximum size (in MB) of the payload that can be signed by the target platform.

nested_items.name: revocationSupported
nested_items.description: A flag indicating whether signatures generated for the signing platform can be revoked.
